body: LEAD: A Medieval Rarity A Medieval Rarity An unrecorded 12th-century enamel plaque depicting Cain and Abel - the only one of 12 surviving Mosan champleve images in private hands - is stirring excitement in London, where it is to be auctioned next Thursday. The medieval rarity was brought to Sotheby's in January ''almost as an afterthought,'' by a
title: Auctions

body: LEAD: This list has been selected from books reviewed since the Christmas issue of December 1988. It only suggests high points in the main fields of reader interest. title: BOOKS FOR VACATION READING
